659ad483-26b2-44bf-ae34-ee8ceed39699.description: Earners of this distinguished badge have been identified as a 'Most Valued Contributor' (MVC) in the My Oracle Support Community for their respective areas of Oracle product/solution expertise. This badge represents an individual's demonstrated history of delivering outstanding community contributions for 2022.
659ad483-26b2-44bf-ae34-ee8ceed39699.name: Most Valued Contributor - My Oracle Support Community - 2022

issuer.summary: issued by My Oracle Support Community

badge_template_activities.title: A My Oracle Support Community MVC demonstrates a deep commitment to sharing knowledge and expertise with fellow community members.

MVCs help resolve peer questions related to the use of Oracle products and solutions, suggest and refine impactful product enhancements, and promote industry-accepted best practices for application use.
Most notably, MVCs exhibit a track record of providing accepted and acknowledged solutions to peer questions related to the use of Oracle products.
